name: Vegetable Ninja (Juliestrator, passivestar)
description:
POV: you are vegan :) 

Here is a game we made in 3,5 hours to learn how to make games! We both loved Fruit Ninja as kids so if you haven't played it go do so! 
  • Veggies - Julie
  • Making the game - passive
  • Sounds and music - Unity Asset store
  • Background assets - Synty Studios
